Maitreya Sales

â€œMaitreya Salesâ€ are one of the leading traders and suppliers of a quality range of Industrial & Automobile Oils and Lubricants of brands like IOC, British Petroleum, Bharat Petroleum, Veedol, I.T.W and Mobil.

We are a well known trader and dealer of a quality range of Industrial & Automobile Oils and Lubricants ofbrands likeIOC, British Petroleum, Bharat Petroleum, Veedol, I.T.W and Mobil. Besides this, we are also engaged in offering a wide range of Tapes, which is used for industrial packaging purposes.

Our range of In Industrial & Automobile Oils and Lubricants is sourced from the trusted and well renowned oil companies such as IOC, Servo, H.P, British Petroleum, Bharat Petroleum, Veedol, I.T.W and Mobil. These brands are present in the industry over a long period of time and have earned high reputation among the customers.

Our range of in Industrial & Automobile Oils and Lubricants is known for superior quality and efficiency. These oils are sourced from well noted oil companies such as IOC, Servo, British Petroleum, Bharat Petroleum, H.P, Veedol, I.T.W and Mobil, who are known for using the latest and modern technology in their oil processing and help in lessening the frictional losses of the moving parts of the machines and automobiles.

We are bestowed with huge accolades and appreciation from customers across the country. Owing to our customer centric approach, we have been able to establish a strong foothold in the industry.
